title: unadu dayai
sahitya:
unadu dayai enaith-thAngum enrirundEn mArAga
 mAyA ulaga bandham idE mighundaduvE


anupallavi

  tanNavan idai yavanNiyenu mAyA jAla valaiyuL shikki mAyA


caraNam    arivilA shiru kuzhaviyAi teru vadanilE-diripozhudhilE
iraivanE unadaruL vidaiyai enadu idhaya nilanil vidaittaiyE
turavu vazhi shelavunadhu tiruvaDi tudi sheyavu maruL vANi tandaiyE
kuraivilAdan ninnaruLum ennaLavil kunriyadO enadannai tandaiyE
